name: Collision Info

inputs.name: Collision Result
inputs.description: The information generated by the Collision Event node

outputs.name: Has Collided
outputs.description: Outputs true if the Rigid Body component has collided with another object in the scene; false if not

outputs.name: Collision Point
outputs.description: The position in the world space where the collision occurred.

outputs.name: Collision Normal
outputs.description: The normal vector of the surface that the Rigid Body component collided with

outputs.name: Relative Velocity
outputs.description: The relative velocity between the two colliding objects

outputs.name: Colliding Object
outputs.description: The object that the target object has collided with

description: Retrieves data from a detected collision event, such as contact points, relative velocity, and impulse
